turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Apicoaortic Conduit.
turn.1: What are the types of valves used in the apicoaortic conduit?
turn.2: Other surgeons have constructed valved conduits on the back table using a variety of bioprosthetic valves such as the Medtronic Freestyle valve.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The Hancock trocars for creating a hole in the left ventricle are rarely used clinically.
turn.5: What are some of the other tools that are used?
turn.6: Surgeons typically assemble their own tools to core and remove a plug of muscle from the left ventricular wall.
turn.7: Do they make any special tools or equipment?
turn.8: In 2011, Correx (Waltham, MA) released a complete kit for AVB with an installation tool that enables coring and insertion of a left ventricle connector on a beating heart while maintaining hemostasis.
